contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 13, 2014 D Miners' Welfare Entertainment Contest
Miners' Welfare Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
miners-welfare-entertainment-contest
None
Grand Pavilion, Porthcawl, Bridgend, Wales, UK Most Entertaining Band: A W Parker (Drybrook) (£200) Highest Third Section Band not in the prizes: Oxford Cherwell (£200) Highest Fourth Section Band not in the prizes: Pillowell Silver (£200) Best Instrumentalist: Steve Ruck (flugel) A W Parker (Drybrook) Best Cornet: Nanette Jones (Ebbw Valley) Best Euphonium: Dafydd Lewis (Gwaun Cae Gurwen) Youngest Player: Oliver Rhys Davies (Ynishir) - aged 9 Prizes - 1st £600, 2nd £400, 3rd £200. 12 bands competed.
Aug. 7, 2014, 3:31 p.m. July 8, 2020, 10:51 a.m.
1 A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Joshua Ruck
2 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter
3 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
4 Melingriffith 2 Band Robin Hackett
5 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
6 Oxford Cherwell Brass Terry Brotherhood
7 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Jeff Hutcherson
8 Cinderford Band Gary Davies
9 Pillowell Silver Band Ian Whitburn
10 Abertillery & District Youth Dean Evans
11 Ynyshir Band Gary Davies
12 Upper Rhondda Brass Band David Langley
Withdrawn Cross Keys Silver Band Benjamin James Atkinson
